nodes.text: A memory crystal was a device used to store information.

One such crystal, the Kyber crystal, was in the possession of the Jedi Master Bolla Ropal and contained a list of potentially Force-sensitive infants. It was highly valuable to the Jedi Order as it contained information crucial to the future of the Order. The Kyber crystal was stolen by the Duros bounty hunter Cad Bane at the behest of Sith Lord Darth Sidious.
